title: Daodex
author: Daodex
content: Bear market haven't even started yet, if you know how ugly a bear market gets you won't be buying altcoins right now, how many altcoins have died so far due to bear market? None right? Well let me tell you, a bear market is a death bringer for altcoins, all those meme coins and shitcoins that you are eyeing won't live to see the end of the bear market, its always so painful for altcoins to stay alive at such season.You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet.

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: Tell them! They don't know. Bear will completely annihilate those shitcoins in your wallet, they will be worth zero Dollar and never recover after the bear. I still have some shitcoins that were doing well before the last bear, after the bear, those tokens are just occupying space in my wallet without any reasonable monetary value. It's crazy.

comments.author: death69
comments.body: Quote from: Daodex on May 10, 2022, 01:59:34 PMBear market haven't even started yet, if you know how ugly a bear market gets you won't be buying altcoins right now, how many altcoins have died so far due to bear market? None right? Well let me tell you, a bear market is a death bringer for altcoins, all those meme coins and shitcoins that you are eyeing won't live to see the end of the bear market, its always so painful for altcoins to stay alive at such season.You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet.Well, actually I believe there will be many stages of the bear market, and each stage will evaporate some shitcoins while slowly destroying others. We have seen this kind of market before in 2018~2020 where many coins disappear forever. This progress, on the other hand, is good for the blockchain since it refines the cryptocurrency market. Those strongest and has many benefits will stay and last.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: Daodex on May 10, 2022, 01:59:34 PMBear market haven't even started yet, if you know how ugly a bear market gets you won't be buying altcoins right now, how many altcoins have died so far due to bear market? None right? Well let me tell you, a bear market is a death bringer for altcoins, all those meme coins and shitcoins that you are eyeing won't live to see the end of the bear market, its always so painful for altcoins to stay alive at such season.You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet.We are in the middle of besr market if we take the ATH into consideration, while talking about altcoin survival in the bear market the percentage is very low and that is what the history says. Some of the best altcoins in the previous cycle doesn't even have any value at all now or they remain too low from what we have expected so calculate how much they will be after the few cycle. In general people are investing on altcoins for short term so there is no wonder if they die in short span.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: that doesn't even make sense and then when it will be started? did you mean when you will be seeing bitcoin will go to the zero value and you call it as a bearish already started? Your statement was not even make sense, the dump has always become the start from the bearish trend. I think that you are missing something from here. Im pretty sure that if you are about this as well but refusing to call this as a bearish trend was so vague. im sure others will call this as the bearish market.

comments.author: masterrex
comments.body: Well for my part I'm already experienced the longest bearish season in the crypto market, it was way back in 2018 and it's not good because the price of all cryptocurrencies is dipping daily the red candle is the dominant figure on the chart that's why it is very frustrating to see your portfolios losing value from time to time and I don't know what to do, but because im afraid to further lose its value that's why I was sold it just to save some of my capital. that's my experience in the bearish season and all those shit coins have perished.

comments.author: Nivia1st
comments.body: Quote from: Daodex on May 10, 2022, 01:59:34 PMBear market haven't even started yet, if you know how ugly a bear market gets you won't be buying altcoins right now, how many altcoins have died so far due to bear market? None right? Well let me tell you, a bear market is a death bringer for altcoins, all those meme coins and shitcoins that you are eyeing won't live to see the end of the bear market, its always so painful for altcoins to stay alive at such season.You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet.what do you mean it hasn't started yet?bitcoin falls to $30kethereum to $2.3kbnb to $310the current price has fallen very deep, or is already -50% of ATH. and the trend is still bearish. so the bear market has started since last month. and there are already a lot of altcoins that have fallen more than 70%.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Ha ha, let this serve as a warning to all investors still looking to buy some small-cap gems in crypto space, the lower an altcoin market cap is the more dangerous they are to survive in a bear market, be careful where you invest your hard-earned money people, watch the market performance in bear market before picking your gems, not all your so called gems today are real gems.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: that's crazy market and it seems like someone is also trying to give another pressure again to the bitcoin market. ¬†Market is going down again straight with the bitcoin price. Im sure that if anyone seeing the market as well. Are you still seeing this an opportunity to enter in the market? I think that this what we called that as the bearish trend when the whole of market was dying and none from the market able to make green candle except garbage token. This is the worst situation in the market.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: masterrex on May 10, 2022, 02:57:07 PMWell for my part I'm already experienced the longest bearish season in the crypto market, it was way back in 2018 and it's not good because the price of all cryptocurrencies is dipping daily the red candle is the dominant figure on the chart that's why it is very frustrating to see your portfolios losing value from time to time and I don't know what to do, but because im afraid to further lose its value that's why I was sold it just to save some of my capital. that's my experience in the bearish season and all those shit coins have perished. Many altcoins from ICO during 2018 lost their values,some teams and devs use that time to abandoned their projects and run. Those coins who survive from that season have what it takes to recover from that market and many learn from that event to not hold too much altcoins since at time like this, the tendency of coins is some will be left behind and only few coins that are performing well will be able to make it again in the trend.

comments.author: Daodex
comments.body: Quote from: bitkanu on May 10, 2022, 02:40:01 PMthat doesn't even make sense and then when it will be started? did you mean when you will be seeing bitcoin will go to the zero value and you call it as a bearish already started? Your statement was not even make sense, the dump has always become the start from the bearish trend. I think that you are missing something from here. Im pretty sure that if you are about this as well but refusing to call this a bearish trend was so vague. im sure others will call this the bearish market. Hm, a Hero member who doesn't know that a bear market has different types of levels just like. the bull market, when Bitcoin reached 40,000$ in 2021 we all thought yes this is hit but it goes over 60,000$ isn't it? A bear market will work in the same way, if BTC goes as low as 27,000$ do not think that's it, it might reach 19,000$. .. The higher the uptrend the dipper the downtrend.

comments.author: Daodex
comments.body: Quote from: Nivia1st on May 10, 2022, 03:03:27 PMQuote from: Daodex on May 10, 2022, 01:59:34 PMBear market haven't even started yet, if you know how ugly a bear market gets you won't be buying altcoins right now, how many altcoins have died so far due to bear market? None right? Well let me tell you, a bear market is a death bringer for altcoins, all those meme coins and shitcoins that you are eyeing won't live to see the end of the bear market, its always so painful for altcoins to stay alive at such season.You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet.what do you mean it hasn't started yet?bitcoin falls to $30kethereum to $2.3kbnb to $310the current price has fallen very deep, or is already -50% of ATH. and the trend is still bearish. so the bear market has started since last month. and there are already a lot of altcoins that have fallen more than 70%.I get you, its just the beginning that's what I meant, in January 2018 Bitcoin was 19,000$ right? And in bear market it was back to 7,000$, who would have thought that BItcoin can go as low as 3,500$ then before the bull market came back? That's what I thought, just because BTC loses 50% already doesn't mean its done. üòè

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: Daodex on May 10, 2022, 01:59:34 PMWell let me tell you, a bear market is a death bringer for altcoins, all those meme coins and shitcoins that you are eyeing won't live to see the end of the bear market, its always so painful for altcoins to stay alive at such season. Meme coins are doomed from the start, they are for the hype game to make short term gains and not for the long term game. Those who do not believe this are making a mistake whose lesson they will soon learn. While the bear market has a bad effect on many coins, I dont give importance to altcoins and that keeps me sane. What should be focused on is bitcoin and seeing it crash means you have a chance to buy at a lower than average price. This is what newbies should keep in mind, not doing which they end up in an endless cycle of being unable to trade and losses.It makes sense to say that altcoins get tested during bear markets. Dont jump into them because they are low, some of them may never go back anymore.

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: Meme coins, NFT and many play to earn projects will face the worst moment ever, 99% of them won't be able to keep up and many will either quit or turn scam, I have sold all my bags weeks ago and I am proud of myself for doing so, its better to go stable coins for now.

comments.author: zidanw
comments.body: We are indeed in a brush market right now, starting to get bad day by day. This is the survival of the fittest, among coins, and it is really expected that a lot will die from here and will totally have no value then. This is why it is never too accurate and always right in following the saying, always buy the dips. Who knows what you bought might turn out to be a dead coin.

comments.author: GigaBit
comments.body: People who are new to the crypto world and falling in bear market most of them lost their confidence in crypto. All most every coin get down from top to bottom line where wallet assets reduce 80-90% value. At that moment nothing to do for a trader but those who spend this time successfully get more than they expect.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Yes, the bear market has come to clean up the mess created by shitcoins and meme coins that give investors nothing. After the bear market, there will be new trends and new coins that will try to attract old and new investors to invest in the new coins.We will see one by one the coins die without being able to rise again and if the current situation worsens, then the coins will not be able to survive.

comments.author: primexbte
comments.body: In my opinion, the downtrend season has come, I took the milestone of December 1, 2021 and it will likely last a few months to a few years, so now I reduce the volume of orders and prioritize sell orders, look at the chart of some top coins with bad candles and broken trend, after the peak of April 5/2021 of most altcoins, even though bitcoin increased by 68k, they still have not reached the shore.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: By what OP means is that bear is yet not here and so you still can dump your shitcoins.Those memecoins that will survive I think will survive also in the next bear market so chose wisely which one. If I have to¬† I think doge will be prefect but it could turn its price right now to¬† $0.01 when the bear market last for more than 3 months. What will happen to the others will first be delisted because there will be no interested anymore and no volume and then puff.

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: I'm a little skeptical if this bear market could be in a similar situation to the last bear market. This is because corporate companies and some governments are buying bitcoin from their own bonds as the bitcoin price drops. I think this time the bear season may be a little shorter or there will not be very deep falls.
